column1: Jennifer Falls is the latest addition to TV Land’s lineup of original sitcoms. It revolves around Jennifer, a successful career woman, that has to completely rebuild her life after losing her high-powered, high-paying job. So, that means she’s moving back in with mom with her teenage daughter in tow! Not exactly what we would call an ideal living situation…but certainly a funny one!
Filming is well underway and from the looks of Twitter, the cast is having tons of fun backstage!
Don’t miss it on June 4th 10:30/9:30C on TV Land!

TV Land: Jennifer Falls is set to air June 2014!!!

“Jennifer Falls is an upcoming American comedy series created by Matthew Carlson, and starring Jaime Pressly in the title role. The series is set to premiere on TV Land on June 4, 2014, and is the first single-camera comedy series for the network. The series follows Jennifer Doyle (Jaime Pressly), a single mother who, after losing her high salary job, has to move back in with her mother.”
